snippet: California Chrome, the overwhelming favorite for the Preakness, was brought up by modest owners in a region long considered inferior to the lush fields of Kentucky.
abstract: Race horse California Chrome, Kentucky Derby winner and strong favorite in the Preakness Stakes, second leg of the Triple Crown, was bred in California by Steve Coburn and Perry Martin; first-time breeders' success has provided shot of adrenaline for California breeders, long considered the poorer cousins of their Kentucky counterparts.
lead_paragraph: California Chrome, the overwhelming favorite for the Preakness, was brought up by modest owners in a region long considered inferior to the lush fields of Kentucky.

headline.seo: Favorite for Preakness Was Bred on a California Ranch
headline.main: Top Horse, From a Place Winners Aren’t Made
headline.print_headline: Top Horse, From a Place Winners Aren’t Made

keywords.value: Harris Farms Horse Division of Harris Rach Beef Co
keywords.name: organizations
